p: The conventional PCR product was purified using the enzyme ExoSAP (Cellco) as instructed by the manufacturer and sequenced by the automated Sanger method, carried out in partnership with the DNA Sequencing Technological Platform (RPT01B IGM) of the Fundação Oswaldo Cruz Bahia—FIOCRUZ/BA. The consensus sequences were produced manually using the MEGA7—Molecular Evolutionary Genetic Analysis software [ 39], having as evaluation basis for this procedure the Phred note of the electropherogram, where priority was given to bases whose values were greater than or equal to 30 (1 probability of error in 1000) [ 40].
